Class EventFeedback

java.lang.Object
com.lucas.ticketsalesmanager.service.communication.EventFeedback
public class EventFeedback extends Object
The EventFeedback class represents a user's feedback for a specific event. It contains the user's rating and comment regarding the event.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventFeedback(User user, Event event, float rating, String comment)
    Constructs an EventFeedback instance with the specified user, event, rating, and comment.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventFeedback

      public EventFeedback(User user, Event event, float rating, String comment)
      Constructs an EventFeedback instance with the specified user, event, rating, and comment.
      Parameters:
      user - The user providing the feedback.
      event - The event being evaluated.
      rating - The rating given to the event, between 0.0 and 5.0.
      comment - The comment accompanying the rating.

  • Method Details

      Gets the user who provided the feedback.
      Returns:
      The user associated with the feedback.

      user - The user to associate with the feedback.

      Gets the rating provided in the feedback.

    • evaluateEvent

      public static EventFeedback evaluateEvent(User user, Event event, float rating, String comment)
      Evaluates an event and creates an EventFeedback instance.
      Parameters:
      user - The user providing feedback.
      event - The event being evaluated.
      rating - The rating for the event.
      comment - The comment for the event.
      Returns:
      A new EventFeedback instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rating is out of range (0.0 - 5.0) or if the comment is empty.
